markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 14"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Deflecting Branch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1448)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City](/Sources.aspx?ID=102) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 4,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Greatclub](/Weapons.aspx?ID=22)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This massive branch has been cut into a general club shape but still bears several knots and has a number of runes carved along its length. The deflecting branch is a _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [greatclub](/Weapons.aspx?ID=22)_. On a critical hit, you knock the target [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

<document level="2" id="action-1089" />

<document level="2" id="action-1090" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Deflecting Branch
